body: Ok, so basically, I'm not allowed to tell the truth. Snow locks the topic and doesn't even know that is happening. He doesn't know anything and assumes to know shit. I wanted to tell the community what happened. The reason why Impact didn't show up is because they got ddoesd. They got dddoesd  because Michael asked Lance to ddos impact. The reason my topic got archived is because or boy Snow can't face the problems, he makes assumptions and acts up them. My topic didn't need to be archived, it just seems like the staff team are running away from the situation.

replies.body:
I'd like to agree with the fact that Michael is acting irresponsibly; unfortunately, I can't.

The evidence is inconclusive; we don't know who said it in the picture, and moreover more of the conversation will probably be needed to actually reach a conclusion.

@Ambi Can you provide a picture of the chat, with the name of the person clearly shown, along with more of the chat? The more you give, the faster this will go, for sure.
